==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Frida:''' Traveler, are you here to try [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]]?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} I'll give it a try.
::'''Frida:''' No problem! Please select the cards you'd like to use.
::'''Frida:''' Oh, and your opponent will be... Let's see... Many players enter the contest using nicknames, and some of them are pretty hard to remember...
::'''Frida:''' Here it is! Your opponent will be [[Cheerful Torchbearer]]. Once you're prepared, you may begin anytime.
::{{Black Screen|Cheerful Torchbearer accepted your challenge, and has come to the table...}}
::{{A|vo card ambor event invite start 01.ogg}} '''Amber:''' So you're the one I'll be playing against! It's a real competition this time, so you'd better be ready!
::{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
::;(Open [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]] interface)
::;(Win the match)
::::{{A|vo card ambor event invite fail 01.ogg}} '''Amber:''' Whoa... You're so much better than everyone I've played against...
::;(Lose the match)
::::{{A|vo card ambor event invite win 01.ogg}} '''Amber:''' Hahaha, I won this round.
::{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
:::{{A|vo card ambor event invite leave 01.ogg}} '''Amber:''' Okay! I need to go over my deck one more time, and if things don't work out... I guess I'll have to ask someone for advice.
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::'''Frida:''' That's alright. Zero Hour Invokation isn't just a one-day event.
::'''Frida:''' You're welcome to come take part anytime during the Grand Prix event period.
{{Dialogue End}}
